programDescriptions.description: Provides administration and oversight of the Commission on Judicial Performance, which is responsible for investigating complaints of judicial misconduct and disciplining judges.
Enforces standards of judicial conduct and provides for the investigation of complaints of judicial misconduct to ensure public confidence in the integrity of the judicial system.
Provides leadership and oversight of California's public education system, including policy development, fiscal management, and program implementation.
Manages and protects California's diverse wildlife species and their habitats through conservation planning, habitat restoration, and species recovery efforts.
Implements wildlife conservation projects and monitors endangered species to ensure biodiversity and ecosystem health throughout California.
Conducts scientific research and manages wildlife populations to balance conservation goals with public use and enjoyment of natural resources.
